import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import employeeImg from '../images/employee.svg' import statuImg from '../images/statu.svg' import criteriaImg from '../images/criteria.png' export class MainNav extends Component { state = { employee: "", statu: "", criterion: "", employees: JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('employee')), status: JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('statu')), criteria: JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('criterion')), listItems:"" } /* listItems = () => { for (let i = 0; i { console.log(this.state.status) this.setState({ [e.target.id]: e.target.value, listItems: this.state.status.map((statu) =>
  • {statu.name}
    • ) }) console.log(this.state.listItems) }; render() { const { employee, statu, criterion } = this.state return (

    EMPLOYEES

      {this.state.listItems}

    STATU

    CRITERIA

    ) } } export default MainNav
